subject: From The Desk Of The Directo
body:
From The Desk Of The Director International Remittance
Department of Foreign Payment Nigeria.
Attn: Beneficiary,
This morning one Dr Eric Murphy  and Mr
Kashima Yamagata from japan came to my office that you sent them to
make claims of your overdue inheritance/compensation fund, they even
promise to give me 15% if i agree to work with them.
But as a Christian i have to confirm if really you are aware of this
development, get back to me as soon as possible for further advice and
directives.
Yours Faithfully,
Ade Osogba
Director
International Remittance
Department.
Private E-Mail: 
sogba238@gmail.com

subject: Re:   From The Desk Of The Directo
body:
Hello Ade Osogba,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I don't recall sending anyone named Dr. Eric Murphy or Mr. Kashima Yamagata from Japan on my behalf.

Could you please provide more details about the situation? What exactly are they claiming and what kind of fund are we talking about here?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Janet
